ModMetaData.name: To My Side! - Medieval
ModMetaData.author: FLASHPOINT55
ModMetaData.description:
Make your beasts stronger with a Runestones.
I changed the techlevel of 'To My Side!' to medieval. and some ingredients changed.
So you can use this mod with other Medieval Mods like Lord Of The Rims.
DO NOT USE TOGETHER WITH 'TO MY SIDE!'-ORIGINAL. :)
